about.title: About
about.intro:
I am a software engineer who values positivity, efficiency, and honesty.
This is a space where I refactor the tangled thoughts in my head into clean text.
While this blog serves more as a personal record than a content for others, it is always open.

Feel free to look around, just like browsing through my source code.
